start.name: System
start.text: You lean in to inspect the :YELLOW:Runic Pillar:YELLOW: more closely.
children: Search the Pillar for an Opening

runes.name: System
runes.text: Reaching out to the runes, you feel faint :BLUEVIOLET:Astral Energy:BLUEVIOLET: emanating from them. Your power surges out of your control and the runes organize themselves into arcane symbols. The pillar lets out a loud crack, and then shatters as if made of glass.

smash.name: System
smash.text: Not being able to understand the runes enrages you. You swing a mighty blow towards the :YELLOW:Runic Pillar:YELLOW: and it shatters into millions of tiny pieces that flicker lightly on the ground of the shrine.

opening.name: System
opening.text: Feeling around the outside of the :YELLOW:Runic Pillar:YELLOW: reveals a slight crack around the base. As your fingers trace the opening it seems to grow in size, rapidly spiralling around the outside of the pillar. With a loud crack, it shatters into millions of tiny pieces.

broken.name: System
broken.text: The pieces of the now shattered shrine let out a keening wail. Sparks jump between them, forming a maelstrom of :BLUEVIOLET:Astral Energy:BLUEVIOLET: in the center of the room. From it steps out a massive four-armed creature wrapped in runic chains. It wears a mask bearing the crest of the :CYAN:Vaelthorne Family:CYAN:, and cracks within it's body reveal many shifting eyes.
